price: (16) Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers[1045] of the Lord of the worlds,
arabic: فَأۡتِيَا فِرۡعَوۡنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [1045]- The singular form in Arabic indicates that both were sent with a single message.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fatiyā fir'ʿawna faqūlā innā rasūlu rabbi al-ʿālamīna
